meaning_str.bing:
n. 研究；探索；调查
v. 研究；调查；探讨
网络. 科研；科学研究；研发

研究；调查；探究；探索；考察；学术研究；研究活动；研究成果
研究；调查；探讨；调查研究；探索；探究；进行科学研究；进行详细研究；搜集资料；做学术研究；进行实验室或田野工作

1.en: One of the challenges of Semantic Web research is creating a URI that reliably identifies a thing rather than some accidental aspect of it.
1.cn: 语义Web搜索遇到的一个挑战是创建可靠标识某个事物的URI，而非局限于事物的某个方面。

2.en: So is building the Semantic Web really a futuristic research vision for a bunch of rocket scientists? As you see, the answer is no.
2.cn: 或许，曾有人担心建立语义网是在从事一项面向未来和火箭科学家们一样困难的研究工作，但正如您已经看到的，事实并不是这样。

3.en: Dr Tom Heffernan, who leads research group, said the findings would be useful in anti-smoking campaigns.
3.cn: 领导研究小组的汤姆·赫夫南博士表示，这一发现有助于反吸烟运动。

0.en: She wants to have dinner and talk about my research.
0.cn: 她想跟我共进晚餐，谈谈我的研究。

1.en: But Penny has no interest in subatomic particle research.
1.cn: 但佩妮对亚原子粒子的研究不感兴趣啊。

2.en: Currently, you're being paid under a grant to specifically research string theory.
2.cn: 目前大学给你的研究基金是只能做特定领域研究的。

3.en: So I've done some research and I've learned. That it is.
3.cn: 所以我做了一些研究，并且发现就是这样。

4.en: If we promote you to junior professor, you'll be able to choose whatever field of research you'd like.
4.cn: 如果我们将你升为初级教授，这样你就能想研究什么就研究什么。

5.en: If you're being targeted, we need to know why. My research.
5.cn: 既然你是目标，我们要知道原因。我的研究。

6.en: All right. But I'll need to see all the research. You got it.
6.cn: 好的，但是我要看所有的研究报告。没问题。

7.en: He's not gonna be there. He's just sending a team to research his theory.
7.cn: 他不会去，他只是派人去研究他的理论。

8.en: New research shows that the couple who sleeps together, stays together!
8.cn: 一项新研究指出，一起过夜的情侣，感情越持久。

9.en: And when I got off the hospital, I started doing a research on exactly this question.
9.cn: 出院后，我便开始了对这问题的研究。

10.en: Bert did quality research. And he deserves whatever accolades he receives.
10.cn: 伯特的研究做得不错，他受到表彰也是理所当然的。

11.en: So he's not fighting all change, then? No, but he likes proper research.
11.cn: 这么说，他也不是反对一切变化。对，但他需要充分研究。

12.en: No, that's crazy. This is my research. Oh, Amy, there you are. No, not...
12.cn: 那太离谱了。这可是我的研究。艾米，你在这呢。不...

13.en: What? That's absurd. Penny has no interest in subatomic particle research.
13.cn: 什么？这太荒谬了。佩妮对亚原子粒子的研究又不感兴趣。

14.en: That means it's better than his research, and by extension, of course, yours.
14.cn: 这就说明比他的研究更高级由此可推，当然也胜过你们。

15.en: I don't know what to say. It's true, I've been working on this theory for over twenty years. But it's only ever been hypothesis and research ideas.
15.cn: 我不知道该说些什么，没错，我研究这个理论20多年，但一切只是假设和研究概念。

16.en: Although my research is going well, I do miss the warmth of human companionship.
16.cn: 尽管我的研究进展顺利，我确实很想念人类陪伴的温暖。

17.en: Excuse me, you might want to check my browser history. I've done some research.
17.cn: 不好意思，你应该看看我的网页浏览记录，我已经做了不少研究。

18.en: We're going to old school. You're gonna do your research at the New York public library.
18.cn: 我们要采取传统方式，你们必须去纽约公共图书馆做研究。

19.en: Your scan data will be very helpful to my research. You have a remarkable brain.
19.cn: 你的扫描资料会对我的研究非常有帮助，你有一颗非比寻常的大脑。
